üå∑‚òòÔ∏èüåµUnder the ABC Waters (Active, Beautiful Clean Waters) program at Sungei Pinang, a Dry Creek was created between the Pond at Punggol Park and Sungei Pinang.
‚òòÔ∏èüåºüèµÔ∏èThe river banks were landscaped with more greenery and its surrounding area spruced up for better Park users experience.
üé¢A connecting Bridge over Sungei Pinang was also built to bring about better connectivity.

Active, Beautiful and Clean.

"By integrating the drains, canals and reservoirs with the surrounding environment in a holistic way, the ABC Waters Programme aims to create beautiful and clean streams, rivers, and lakes with postcard-pretty community spaces for all to enjoy."

This is the ABC waters @ Sungei Pinang area where it sits between Punggol Park and the Sungei Pinang canal. The canal embankments along the Hougang park connector were beautified - vegetation were allowed to creep naturally, making the canal look more like a river over time.
